746910.name: Chicken Farm 2K17
746910.description:
An all new instalment for the running Chicken Farm Series is here, and this time it's bigger and better than ever!

Chicken Farm is a management game with clicker aspects, where the goal is getting as much cash as you can. To grow your farm you'll need to catch eggs from the chickens, work at the market to gain income, sell your fatter chickens for a tidy profit and cash in on the egg catching combo meter.

The further you progress the more fun the game becomes, with chickens gaining cool abilities allowing differing income strategies and interesting ways to play.
746910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
